text: Quite disappointed with this laptop, the Refurbished: Dell Inspiron 5000 Premium 15.6 Full HD Anti-Glare Gaming Laptop,Intel Core i5-7300HQ Quad-Core,NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 ,8GB RAM ,1TB HDD , Backlit -Keyboard, MaxxAudio,Bluetooth,HDMI,Windows 10 home. It's a decent gaming laptop for the money.
